resources.string: Your scenario can\'t be saved due to an internal error.\nDo you want to modify it or cancel all your modifications ?

Smart AutoClicker is incorrectly installed and can\'t start the detection.\n\nIf you have installed it from a legitimate application store, please contact us on GitHub, as it will help us fix this issue.
